Context: The Alumni Recognition Awards are presented annually by George Brown College to members of its alumni community whose contributions and accomplishments have demonstrated leadership and enhanced the reputation of the alumni community and the College. Two alumni will be recognized from each category. Nominations are accepted continuously throughout the year, and can be submitted by anyone including employers, friends, colleagues, and family members. The completed nomination forms with supporting documentation must be received by February 20, 2024 for consideration in that year. The selection process is administered by Alumni Relations through an Awards Selection Committee, and decisions are based on the nominee's accomplishments in alignment with the award criteria. Anyone can learn more about the awards or sign up for college updates on the George Brown alumni web pages. Contact information for inquiries: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The text also includes a link to learn more about land acknowledgment.
